content: What is your current focus this week?

This week, my focus is on preparing for the upcoming VBoarder board meeting by researching and analyzing key questions related to the organization's strategic direction, market opportunities, and performance trends. I am also testing new AI models to improve our system's efficiency and exploring potential use cases for their implementation. Additionally, I will be updating the organizational knowledge base with my findings and collaborating with CTO and CEO on model recommendations and strategic research.
